stories.title: Apple fined for slowing down old iPhones (2020)
The Value of an In-House Adversary

stories.text:
I just got a new phone after 4 years (iPhone x to iPhone 13 Pro). And its mind boggling how much faster the phones opens Apps etc.

But I ask myself, why? I mean, web browsing, open spreadsheet apps etc. Did developers become so lazy that they don‘t really optimize anymore?

A phone created this year should perform the basic tasks as well as in 5 years, shouldn‘t it?
stories.title: Ask HN: How can old phones be slower while doing basic tasks?

stories.text:
Ideas in different fields, from GPU programming to Web development...

Is the computing (PCs, Cloud services, video game consoles, ...) contribution to the gobal climate change high?
